title: Revel Red Envelope - Daily Limit?
body:
Hey all,

As the title suggests, I had no idea there was a daily limit to buying the Revel Red Envelopes that're part of the whole Lunar Revel thing. Does anyone know what the limit per day is, and where I could see when the "timer" resets?

Thanks!

replies.body:
I just tested it and it looks like you can purchase up to (2) of the 10x + 1 bonus envelope bundles and (1) of the 5x + Bonus Essence bundles per day.

I hope this helps!
